topic.title: Recruitment of UNC0N4
topic.body: UNC0N4 (Unconditional) is a mix of everything. An open group that everyone can join. Real hackers, lamers, script kiddies, politicians... Shape the future for the good of public. Destroy megacorps and let the open source be the thing. We won't need to lie if we turn the truth to good. We are the new order, Unconditional. crabrave@protonmail.com

1545846366_1D6UcmziWg55aXV6TnCksXpjsFJ4g.body:
> [deafboy](#comment_66_1xf9XC4Nsa7YfQWFiK6xGsNDJA3AaCTUa): Not enough seeders for a marxist blog? Oddly satisfying...

Yeah can't connect.
